author: theguitarist
title: High cliffs / mountainous areas in and around Bangalore
text: India Mike » India Travel » Cities in India » Bangalore » High cliffs / mountainous areas in and around Bangalore High cliffs / mountainous areas in and around Bangalore # 1 I spent some time in Nepal recently and I am back to Bangalore sitting at a computer writing code :P I miss visiting and hanging out in cliffy and mountainous areas. There is nothing like spending an evening with friends near the edge of a cliff with the wind washing your face. Any advice for peaceful places mountainous places with less / no crowd? Safety isn't really problem I guess since we plan to go in a large group.
